info.name: Just Dance Now | Fanmade
info.description:
this is a fan made style for just dance now 
its not similar to any jd game
its our own interface from all old just dance games
info.additionalInfo:
version 1.00 release changes in pictos beat and line and particles
version 0.96 beta - fixed this image you are requesting does not exist error
version 0.95 beta - new stars and starbar align
                               no room number in gameplay
                               player level and flag are come back
                               new player aligny
                               a little line from the left on the gameplay just for decoration

version 0.9 beta - jd 2016 gold move
                             changed players align with no level and flag appeared
                             jd 2018 pictos particles with more bars
                             jd 2018 transition with jdn animations
                             jd 2018 racetrack and new size for it

data.title: My review of this Just Dance Now style
